meanings.definition: Organisms that cause diseases in plants.
meanings.sent1: Farmers work hard to protect their crops from phytopathogens.
meanings.sent2: The phytopathogens in the soil were affecting the growth of the tomato plants.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous phytopathogens played hide and seek among the flowers.
meanings.sent4: The phytopathogens spread through the fields like a silent plague.
meanings.sent5: The presence of phytopathogens turned the once vibrant garden into a scene of devastation.

meanings.sent1: Researchers are studying a new phytopathogen that is affecting citrus trees.
meanings.sent2: The phytopathogens were identified as the cause of the wilting leaves on the apple tree.
meanings.sent3: The tiny phytopathogens whispered secrets to the roots of the plants.
meanings.sent4: The phytopathogens crept through the garden, unseen and destructive.
meanings.sent5: The farmer battled against the relentless invasion of phytopathogens in his fields.
